title: Contact Detail
description: Details of a method by which an entity such as a Person or OrganisationalUnit may be contacted. The Address class should be used to store physical or postal addresses. For all other types of contact details, this class should be used.

properties.name: contactDetailCategory
properties.description: The method of contact to which the contact detail applies.

properties.name: contactDetailType
properties.description: The type of contact detail, which can be used to distinguish between multiple contact details of the same contactDetailCategory.

properties.name: contactDetailValue
properties.description: The value of the contact detail, such as the phone number or email address.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.
